title: Notwithstanding the provisions of Regulation No
clause_text: Notwithstanding the provisions of Regulation No. 41 Table No 18 where the location of the plot abuts DP Road, having width of 18.3 m and above, the front marginal open space shall be at least 3.00 m provided it is not an express highway or road wider than 52 m
section: RELAXATION IN BUILDING AND OTHER REQUIREMENTS:
